snippet: The bank, which is the executor of Jimmy Savile’s estate, put distributions on hold in anticipation of numerous claims for damages arising from accusations of sexual abuse.
abstract: British bank NatWest says it has frozen estate of disgraced television host Jimmy Savile because of possible claims for damages arising from accusations of sexual abuse.
lead_paragraph: The bank, which is the executor of Jimmy Savile’s estate, put distributions on hold in anticipation of numerous claims for damages arising from accusations of sexual abuse.

headline.seo: Jimmy Savile Estate Frozen by Bank
headline.main: Bank Freezes Estate Over Possible Claims for Damages
headline.print_headline: Bank Freezes Estate Over Possible Claims for Damages
